info.aboutUsText: This project was created because other spy games lacked  the editing and creating new locations functionality. It needed to be fixed.
info.callToAction: If you have any suggestions, write to Telegram or Instagram.

slide1.title: Spy - a game, which has questions to you!
slide1.description: All you need is at least three people, phones, and to read these rules.

slide2.title: This game has spies and locals
slide2.description: The game will determine roles and inform locals (not the spies) about their locations.

slide3.title: The main goal for locals - find the spies
slide3.description: Locals see the location and must, without revealing it, figure out who the spiy is during the game.

slide4.title: The main goal for the spy - to understand the location
slide4.description: Do not reveal yourself! Only when you are sure, reveal and say your guess.

slide5.title: Choose a person to ask the first question
slide5.description: After answering, ask the next question to any player except the one who asked the previous question.

slide6.title: Ask each other about the location
slide6.description: Through questions and answers, try to understand who really knows the location and who is just pretending. Be careful and do not reveal yourself!

slide7.title: You're the spy and think you've understood the location?
slide7.description: Tap on pause and announce the location. If you guessed, you win! If not, the locals win.

slide8.title: Each player can start voting once
slide8.description: Tap on pause and share your thoughts about the spy. If the majority also votes for the proposed person, that person reveals their role.

slide9.title: If that person is the spy
slide9.description: Then the locals win. On the winner's screen, you can see the location and who the spy was.

slide10.title: If that person is a local
slide10.description: Then the spies win. If time runs out and the spy is not found even during the final voting (after the end of the time), the spy wins.

slide11.title: Play with roles
slide11.description: If this option is enabled, locals receive roles. Answer and ask questions considering your role.

slide12.title: Enjoy the game!
slide12.description: Don't forget to change settings and locations for more interesting games and heated discussions! You can edit locations by pressing the map icon, then swipe left to open location settings.
